page.title: 08VALLEY FARM.
page.content: {VALLEY FARM:}Originally Valley Farm was used for a resting place for cattle and they fattened them up for market. Walking cattle from Wales was very tiring so they stopped to rest at quite a few farms and Valley Farm was the last stop before they got to the market. Valley Farm concentrates on Livestock and they grow hay and buy food. There are 4 people that work there,1 full time worker and 3 part time workers. There are 550 sheep,2000 chickens and 3 horses used for show jumping. 10 fields are for grazing and 25 for growing crops so there are 25 fields. They have no Combine Hravesters but 3 tractors.There are 3 sheepdogs,4 cows and 1 bull. Altogether the farm is 125 acres.
